headline: Services I Offer
subheadline: Comprehensive technical solutions for modern challenges

services.title: Web Application Development
services.description: Full-stack web application development using modern frameworks like React, Next.js, and Node.js. I build responsive, performant and accessible web applications that meet business needs.

services.title: Mobile App Development
services.description: Native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android using React Native, Flutter, and Swift. From concept to app store, I deliver user-friendly mobile experiences.

services.title: Business Solutions
services.description: Custom business applications, CRMs, ERPs, and workflow automation tools tailored to your specific industry needs and challenges.

services.title: Data Analytics & AI Integration
services.description: Data modeling, analytics, and AI integration solutions that help organizations make data-driven decisions, gain valuable insights, and leverage artificial intelligence capabilities.

services.title: IoT Solutions
services.description: Internet of Things application development, connecting smart devices and creating systems that bring real-world data into digital workflows.

services.title: Technical Consultation
services.description: Expert advice on technology stack selection, architecture design, code reviews, and best practices to elevate your development processes
